# Bible Verse Randomizer

> Free random Bible verse generator and comprehensive Scripture resource. 13,000+ pages covering 31,000+ verses across 6 translations, 447 topics, 3,777 occasions, and all 66 books.

## About

Bible Verse Randomizer helps people discover God's Word through a random verse generator, topical browsing, occasion-based Scripture discovery, verse-by-verse study with 6 translations, and complete chapter reading. The site covers all 66 books of the Bible with summaries, themes, key verses, and full chapter text in NIV, KJV, ESV, NLT, MSG, and NASB.

## Main Sections

- [Home](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/): Random Bible verse generator with topic filtering
- [Browse by Topic](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/topics): 447 topics — love, faith, hope, forgiveness, strength, and more
- [Browse by Occasion](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/for): 3,777 occasions — weddings, funerals, tattoos, graduations, and hundreds of life situations
- [Books of the Bible](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/books): All 66 books with summaries, themes, chapter counts, and key verses
- [Daily Verse](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/daily): A new Bible verse every day

## Content Types

### Topic Pages (/topic/[slug])
447 topic pages containing curated Bible verses about specific themes (e.g., love, faith, healing). Verses selected based on keyword relevance with full NIV text and FAQ schema.

### Occasion Pages (/for/[slug])
3,777 occasion pages helping users find Bible verses for specific life events — weddings, funerals, graduations, tattoos, comfort in grief, military service, work stress, and more.

### Book Pages (/book/[slug])
66 book overview pages covering all books of the Bible with author, date, chapter and verse counts, summary, key themes, and notable verses.

### Chapter Pages (/book/[book]/[chapter])
1,189 chapter pages — the full text of every chapter in the NIV translation. Each page includes verse numbers, prev/next navigation across book boundaries, a chapter grid, and FAQ schema.

### Translation Chapter Pages (/book/[book]/[chapter]/[translation])
5,945 additional chapter pages in KJV, ESV, NLT, MSG, and NASB translations. Each includes translation context, approach description, cross-translation links, and chapter navigation.

### Verse Detail Pages (/verse/[reference])
1,000 verse pages for the most popular Bible verses. Each shows the verse in all 6 translations with context, meaning, application, prayer, and FAQ schema.

### Verse Comparison Pages (/verse/[reference]/compare)
1,000 side-by-side translation comparison pages showing how 6 Bible translations render the same verse, with word count analysis and translation philosophy context.

## Translations Available

- **NIV** (New International Version) — dynamic equivalence, balanced accuracy and readability
- **KJV** (King James Version) — formal equivalence, classic 1611 prose
- **ESV** (English Standard Version) — essentially literal, modern scholarly standard
- **NLT** (New Living Translation) — thought-for-thought, accessible modern English
- **MSG** (The Message) — contemporary paraphrase by Eugene Peterson
- **NASB** (New American Standard Bible) — most literal English translation

## Data Sources

Content sourced from established Bible translations. 31,000+ verses per translation, 1,000 priority verses with detailed commentary, 719 topical themes, and 3,808 occasion categories.
